name: dataPro_testFlow

steps.name: When passwords get stolen
steps.behavior: Explain to the user why stolen passwords can be a threat to them and their data.

steps.name: Check for stolen data
steps.behavior: Tell the user that they should check if their data go stolen on https://haveibeenpwned.com/

steps.name: Create list of stolen data
steps.behavior: Tell the user that they should write down for which websites their data got compromised.

steps.name: Handling of compromised data
steps.behavior: Tell the user that you will guide them in how to secure their accounts correctly and prevent future incidents.

steps.name: Login Methods
steps.behavior: Give the user an overview over the different security levels of login methods. From unsafe to safe: 1. Password only 2. Password with SMS or call as 2FA 3. 2FA with security app or device. 4. Login methods without passwords (Biometry, Face recognition, Passkeys).

steps.name: Passwordless Login
steps.behavior: Explain in detail the advantages of passwordless login.

steps.name: Passwordless Login
steps.behavior: Explain in detail the advantages of passwordless login.

steps.name: Passwordless Login
steps.behavior: Explain in detail the advantages of passwordless login.

steps.name: 2FA
steps.behavior: Explain in detail how and why 2FA increases account security.

steps.name: 1-Button Login
steps.behavior: Explain to the user why logging in via a 3rd party provider (e.g. login with Google) poses some security risks.

steps.name: Creating secure passwords
steps.behavior: Give the user different methods of coming up with secure passwords. (e.g. sentence where the starting letters of the word make the password). Also advertise the password generator on https://www.random.org/

steps.name: Storing an managing passwords
steps.behavior: Explain why and how password managers help storing, organizing and accessing passwords and why this is more secure.

steps.name: Staying alert
steps.behavior: Explain how staying alert is important and that passwords and logins should regularly be checked for suspicious activity. Advertise the notifications service on https://haveibeenpwned.com/NotifyMe where they get notified if their data appears in a leak.

journeyGoal: The goal is to lead the user through the steps.
